name: Hellslinger
storyline:
Play as the Hellslinger in her battle out of Hell.

In life she was a reckless outlaw, and a gunfighter thought to be unmatched, until a dark turn of fate found her in a hollow grave... and trapped in the Infernal Realm. After centuries of suffering and torture, a small splinter of hope finally revealed itself to her from the most unlikely source. A strange figure approached her, offering her a path back to the World of the Living, and to a new life. The only request in exchange for such help? To find and assassinate Abaddon, the supreme General of Hell, before he can wage his campaign to end life on Earth.

Time is running short, and Hellslinger's journey has just begun…
summary: Blast your way through the hordes of Hell as you strive to reclaim your soul in this narrative driven FPS. You are Hellslinger, a master of the gun. Shouldn't be too hard right? All you've got to do is slay the Lord of Hell and stop his invasion of the mortal realm
